title: Burgundy lamb shanks
ingredients: ['4 lamb shanks', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons dried parsley', '2 teaspoons minced garlic', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/2 teaspoon grated lemon zest', '75g chopped onion', '1 medium carrot, chopped', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '250ml Burgundy wine or beef stock', '1 teaspoon concentrated beef stock']
